SQL:
select * from REP_ALLOT_INFORM rar left join T_S_USERCARDINFO tsu on rar.create_by = tsu.user_name left join t_s_user tsus on tsu.user_card_id = tsus.cardid left join T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub on tsrub.userid = tsus.id where tsrub.orgid in (select t.id from T_S_DEPART t start with t.id = (select distinct tsrub.orgid from T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub where tsrub.userid = '${uuid}') connect by t.parentdepartid = prior t.id) and (ISDELETED is null or ISDELETED = 0)
order by CREATE_DATE DESC
